docs.text: Combat Tests results on 10k stats and qualities Equip: dragon helm, vapntreyiu, plate mail, plate gauntlets, plate greaves, bat wing, ranger's boots, wooden roundshield (for 1h weapon). attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP quick barrage sword 80r 600 -1 low blow sword 50g 0 -1 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 punch sword 80g 545 0 left hook sword 75b 485 0 punch both sword 75y 325 0 sideswipe sword 65y 780 0 flex sword 80b 0 0 uppercut sword 80y 0 0 haymaker sword 65y 345 0 steal thunder sword 50b 0 0 sting sword 80b 50y 1055 2 storm sword 90y 1300 2 knock sword 90r 1835 1 kick sword 80y 965 1 chop sword 75g 860 1 ravens bite b12 65g 65y 2755 4 go 4 jugular sword 70g 50r 1520 2+2 takedown sword 90y 1960 3 rip apart sword 30x4 685 6 cleave sword 65r 360 4+2 Weapon difference Spear deal more dps but you can't use shield with it. B12 is just slow. attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP full circle spear 75g 30r 185 0 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 full circle b12 70g 30r 110 0
docs.title: Combat

docs.text: Spear deal more dps but you can't use shield with it. B12 is just slow. attack weapon opening/30s damage/30s IP full circle spear 75g 30r 185 0 full circle sword 75g 30r 110 0 full circle b12 70g 30r 110 0

docs.text: Notes Buildings designs: Orange: Cork Oak + Iron Ochre + Copper Blue: Silver Fir + Kyanite + Wrought Iron Green: Mayflower + Zinscpar + Tin A leech deals damage over 3 bites, approximately equal to its quality. Mushroom support radius = 9 tiles. Public structures qualities Stick q250+ = 1g SHM Kiln 208 SHM 179 LMC Smelter 153 LMC FForge 201 LMC PWheel 233 SHM Anvil 242 SHM Oven 157 BBS

docs.title: Credo

docs.text: Публичные задачи Построить базу Строить шахту. Выделить место под: жилища, кухню, животных, цех. Заселить животных. Заселиться. Делать сыр. Улучшать качество чугуна. Делать сталь. Строить холлы.
docs.title: Задачи

docs.text: Строить шахту. Выделить место под: жилища, кухню, животных, цех. Заселить животных. Заселиться. Делать сыр. Улучшать качество чугуна. Делать сталь. Строить холлы.
docs.title: Построить базу
